name: Cyber War: Idle Tower Defense
description:
Charge into the action of the best Tower Defense game ever created, use your strategy to defend the kingdom and this cyberpunk game will keep you hooked for hours!


If you’re ready to dive into a cyberpunk world with full of gang wars, cyber weapons, survival battles, then welcome to Cyber War: Cyberpunk Tower Defense Game, where it all begins!
Fight in your own way, select your unique battle styles and choose your cyber fighters to win this epic shadow battle. In this forgotten cyberpunk city, you won’t be disappointed with a massive of hack n slash combats, amazing design concept and epic shadow battle.

It is the year 2077, the end of the century has come, Earth has just experienced a catastrophic war that lasted nearly 50 years with alien invaders - races with extraordinary powers. In Cyber War: Idle Tower Defense Game, the rush of the alien creature has never been that cruel, these battles can bring humanity into the most horrible disaster. Only by fighting against an endless wave of enemy attacks as well as the most dangerous Bosses can you protect your base, eliminate invaders, defense tower and bring back the peace to the Earth.

Will you survive till the very end of this survival battle? Join this FREE Tower idle defense game now with us to become the greatest Defender Hero! This strategic idle defense shooting game will make you unable to take your eyes off! Summon the greatest heroes, upgrade the most powerful weapons, build the strongest legendary army and create your own strategy, let's your battle begin!

FEATURE
- Epic Idle Defense Battle: each level contains several waves of mighty enemies and crazy bosses which challenges your training and strategic skills
- Collection of Legendary Heroes with unique skills to build the strongest defender hero team to win this tower defense battle
- Heavy weapons and powerful add-on magic gears
- Attractive Epic Missions everyday
- A series of dangerous enemy and dread bosses
- An impressive variety of daily quests, daily gift, achievement, free coins and gems
- Thousands of fascinating levels and many maps are waiting for you to explore

HOW TO PLAY
- Take a defensive position, choose proper heroes, tap to shoot the enemy to defense tower
- Upgrade weapons to increase their power
- Improve your skill set by strategically combining elemental technology
- Equip the right gear as well as collect rare heroes

Can you withstand the onslaught of the last bosses? Collect all weapons and become the greatest hero in this Cyber War IDLE Defense Game!
